Key Match Events: Geraldo Perdomo's critical ninth-inning decision leading to the Mets' game-winning run
Post-Match Reflections: Torey Lovullo emphasized the game's significance and the team's determination to perform well moving forward; Geraldo Perdomo reflected on his decision and the team's mindset
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Diamondbacks were leading the NL Wild Card standings and faced a crucial matchup with the Dodgers next; the game marked the final head-to-head meeting between the two teams in the regular season
